item.title: Natalie add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "This morning, Tegus welcomed me again with an arm clasp and cheek touch. I wasn't startled this time, and I breathed in at his neck. How can I describe the scent of his skin? He smells something like cinnamon-- brown and dry and sweet and warm. Ancestors, is it wrong for me to imagine laying my head on his chest and closing my eyes and breathing in his smell?" -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "I know I would crumble if I lost you." -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "They finished laughing and caught their breaths, and looked at each other, and Ani thought Geric looked at her too long, as though he forgot he was looking, as though he did not wish to do anything else. She looked back. Her took heart took its time quieting down." -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "All I've ever wanted was to be near you." -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "When you get tired of worrying and mourning your horse and trying not to be afraid, tell me and I'll do it for you a while so you can shut your eyes and sleep peaceful." -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "Right now I'd like all my troubles to stand in front of me in a straight line, and one by one I'd give each a black eye. " -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "Mama used to say, you have to know someone a thousand days before you can glimpse her soul." -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "I keep thinking about a tale my nurse used to read to me about a bird whose wings are pinned to the ground. In the end, when he finally frees himself, he flies so high he becomes a star. My nurse said the story was about how we all have something that keeps us down." -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "You're better than seven years of food. You're better than windows. You're even better than the sky." -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "I do like the world quite a lot." -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "He had a dashing smile. It nearly dashed right off his face." -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "My mama used to say, 'Are you sad? Then just wait a minute." -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "Razo hopped back up and adopted a posture that said he was completely unruffled, never had been, and in fact was ready to do something manly like lift boulders or swallow live worms." -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "If we're mad, we're mad in large numbers, at least larger than yours." -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "... If we don't tell strange stories, when something strange happens we won't believe it." -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "I let my head fall back, and I gazed into the Eternal Blue Sky. It was morning. Some of the sky was yellow, some the softest blue. One small cloud scuttled along. Strange how everything below can be such death and chaos and pain while above the sky is peace, sweet blue gentleness. I heard a shaman say once, the Ancestors want our souls to be like the blue sky." -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "I, Geric-Sinath of Gerhard, declare that you're beautiful and you're perfect and I'll slay any man who tries to take you from my side. Goose girl, may I kiss you?" -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "You saw my leg?" "How can a man help what he sees?" he said. "And, if I could add, you possess a very fine leg." -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Shannon Hale
item.description: "Razo wasn't good at anything except maybe cramming two cherries up one nostril." -- Shannon Hale

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "Deep in the meadow, hidden far away A cloak of leaves, a moonbeam ray Forget your woes and let your troubles lay And when it's morning again, they'll wash away Here it's safe, here it's warm Here the daisies guard you from every harm Here your dreams are sweet and tomorrow brings them true Here is the place where I love you." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "Sometimes, when I clean a kill, I feed Buttercup the entrails. He has stopped hissing at me. Entrails. No hissing. This is the closest we will ever come to love." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "Well, I knew that goat would be a little gold mine," I say. Yes, of course I was referring to that, not the lasting joy you gave your sister you love so much you took her place in the reaping," says Peeta drily." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "Remember, we're madly in love, so it's all right to kiss me anytime you feel like it." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Gail Carson Levine
item.description: "Hush Hattie!" I said, intoxicated with my success. "I don't want to go to my room. Everyone must know I shan't marry the prince." I ran to the door to our street, opened it, and called out into the night, "I shan't marry the prince." I turned back into the hall and ran to Char and threw my arms about his neck. "I shan't marry you." I kissed his cheek. He was safe from me." -- Gail Carson Levine

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Gail Carson Levine
item.description: "He is flawless, without a blemish. Majesic . . . muscular." -- Gail Carson Levine

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Gail Carson Levine
Natalie add a quote by Charlotte Bronte
item.description: "All my heart is yours, sir: it belongs to you; and with you it would remain, were fate to exile the rest of me from your presence forever." -- Charlotte Bronte

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "I know I must conceal my sentiments: I must smother hope; I must remember that he cannot care much for me. For when I say that I am of his kind, I do not mean that I have his force to influence, and his spell to attract: I mean only that I have certain tastes and feelings in common with him.I must, then, repeat continually that we are forever sundered: - and yet, while I breathe and think, I must love him." -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "The more you like yourself, the less you are like anyone else, which makes you unique." -- Walt Disney
